edge_1: Rocket was found as a baby raccoon and experimented on by the High Evolutionary, who sought to enhance and anthropomorphize animal lifeforms.
edge_2: The Guardians of the Galaxy are critically wounded when attacked by Adam Warlock, but Rocket's wounds prove more severe due to a kill switch embedded in him by Orgocorp.
